snippet: This week’s diplomatic choreography — with Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton and the Iranians in New Delhi — provided a window into the realpolitik of sanctions against Iran.
abstract: Sec of State Hillary Rodham Clinton's visit to New Delhi awkwardly coincides with the arrival of an Iranian trade delegation; several Indian business groups meet with the Iranians, defying Clinton's declaration that India should reduce imports of Iranian oil and comply with Western sanctions.

byline.contributor: Gardiner Harris and Hari Kumar contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: This week’s diplomatic choreography — with Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton and the Iranians in New Delhi — provided a window into the realpolitik of sanctions against Iran.

headline.seo: Indians Host Hillary Rodham Clinton While Also Wooing Iran
headline.main: Indians Host Clinton While Also Wooing Iran
headline.print_headline: Indians Host Clinton While Also Wooing Iran
